> Less One Shots
> Sandbox Mode (Custom Games and No XP/IP Gain)
> A Working Report System
> The Tribunal of Justice 2016 Edition
> A Working Tribunal in S6
> Want to keep one shots? Create OneShot Mode (Custom Games and No XP/IP Gain)
> Destroy those people posting "free rp legit" :

As an update to the free RP spammers on the Boards, we've made a few updates to moderation, and I'm currently going back to remove anything we've missed. Please don't hesitate to use the report feature for anything that you see that violates the Boards Guidelines. 

Cheers!
